data.eml:eml:
The bryophyte herbarium at Tromsø Museum.

This collection is of varying quality. A large part of the large genus Sphagnum from the Trøndelag area, northern Norway and Svalbard has been revised recently.

As the herbarium is being digitized, a lot is being done to improve data quality (taxonomic revision) and the quality of the physical specimens themselves (new labels etc).
